body_content.explanation: all the music or plays, etc. that you can do or perform or that you know:
examples: The Royal Shakespeare Company also have many modern plays in their repertoire.
There is an extensive repertoire of music written for the flute.

body_content.explanation: all the things that someone can do, all the methods that someone can use, etc.:
examples: I'm not a great cook - pasta and pesto is the extent of my repertoire.
As young people move from childhood into adolescence, their coping repertoires increase.
